thread.title: Liberal Oscar Attendees Bash Trump Over Illegals, Then Get STUNNING Challenge
thread.title_full: Liberal Oscar Attendees Bash Trump Over Illegals, Then Get STUNNING Challenge

author: Kim Smith
title: Liberal Oscar Attendees Bash Trump Over Illegals, Then Get STUNNING Challenge
text:
James Woods Just Tweeted the Ultimate Welfare Leech Slam… EVERYONE Needs to See This 
“I propose that Meryl Streep , Chelsea Handler, Richard Gere, Robert DeNiro, Christoph Waltz and others lead an Oscar first: Let’s do away with the rules, barriers and tickets to the Oscars and after-parties, such as the swanky Vanity Fair party or the Weinsteins’ star-studded affair,” he wrote. 
The “Iceman” star then asked that “all migrants, all illegal immigrant criminals and all unvetted refugees converge on Hollywood” and attend the Oscars as well as the after-parties that are scheduled for Feb. 26 at the Dolby Theater on Hollywood Boulevard. 
“After all, we in the Hollywood community want to show all Islamic extremists that we have love in our hearts — and what better way to do that than by inviting them along on our most important night?” he wrote. Advertisement - story continues below 
Davi went on to say that of the 3,600 seats available at the Oscars, at least 2,500 of them should be reserved for illegal aliens, refugees and migrants. 
You have to admit, this would be a good opportunity for the leftists to show how much they believe in inclusion. 
Of course, the Hollywood elitists will scoff at Davi’s challenge and find some excuse for why it isn’t a good idea for them, but in actuality it is a fantastic idea because it shines a bright light on the hypocrisy of the left. 
Hollywood liberals love preaching about inclusion to others about how to live but they never follow their own advice. Advertisement - story continues below
